p.text: With the help of this useful facility, any program established in event (a click, text input, mouse movement) can cause artificially, without waiting it makes the user.

p.textAll: For example, in this case When double click on Knopke2 will be caused by different actions are totally Events - Clique on Knopke1 . Thus, when clicking on Knopke1 and double click on Knopke2 occur alone and tezhe action (in this case, change the text Nadpisi1). And this is a very convenient method, in cases where, for example, lot different buttons perform the same action.
